definition: (of a livestock animal) plump and strong/well-fed
fat/fertile/loose-fitting or large/to fertilize/to become rich by illegal means/fertilizer/manure
Zhuang ethnic group of Guangxi, the PRC's second most numerous ethnic group

sentences.english: The cattle battened on the plentiful fodder.
sentences.chinese: 牲畜靠豐美的飼料養得膘肥體壯。

sentences.english: The pigs battened on the plentiful fodder.
sentences.chinese: 那些豬飼料充足，喫得膘肥體壯。
